title: Mathematical Metaphysics' Bernard Skomal:  A conversation about Love, Purpose and a Bus to Heaven
description:
Bernard Skomal of Mathematical Metaphysics joins me for a wide ranging conversation about the meaning of life, its source, our purpose and our destination. 

Along the way, we talk about 
Brian Keating's interview with Caleb Scharf about the nature of information:
https://youtu.be/cizY1Eg4Cws start at 36:35
Jordan Peterson's lecture on Maps of Meaning regarding anomaly:
https://youtu.be/ZHmklvx9oJ4 start at 1:35

C. S. Lewis book The Great Divorce

Stephen Wolfram's new theory regarding fundamental physics

Bernard's channel, Mathematical Metaphysics, 3 videos regarding Wolfram:

Part 1:  https://youtu.be/3RLy-V5AAc4
Part 2:  https://youtu.be/xa6dJEcV0gQ
Part 3:  https://youtu.be/qbktjfIRnOs
